1065437715443998720.Title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
1065437715443998720.Text: Here’s a list of what I think are the best Robin Hood movies ever made: The Adventures of Robin Hood (1938) Robin Hood (1973 Disney Version) Robin Hood : Prince of Thieves Robin Hood : Men in Tights These are the best and no other Robin Hood film will ever be able to top them.
